Author: GitHub
Title: GitHub Universe 2025 Opening Keynote
Description:
Join us for the opening keynote, where we'll kick things off with our latest product announcements, live demos, and maybe a few surprises that showcase the future of building with GitHub. From AI and agents as true accelerators, to the strength of our global ecosystem, see how we’re helping developers move faster and build with confidence.

Speakers:

Kyle Daigle, COO, GitHub Jessica Deen, Staff Developer Advocate, GitHub Pierce Boggan, PM Lead, VS Code, Microsoft

— CHAPTERS —

00:00:00 Welcome to GitHub Universe 00:03:47 Introducing coding agents 00:04:22 Announcing Agent HQ 00:08:47 Demo: Agent HQ with Jessica Deen 00:14:28 The new agent workflow 00:15:09 Agent HQ is welcoming all coding agents 00:17:30 Partner: Anthropic's Claude joins Agent HQ 00:19:15 Demo: Claude in Agent HQ 00:21:24 Partner: OpenAI's Codex comes to VS Code 00:22:12 Demo: Using Codex in VS Code 00:26:16 Agent partner availability 00:26:47 The AI-native editor: VS Code 00:30:02 Announcing Plan Mode in VS Code 00:30:48 Demo: Plan Mode and custom agents with Pierce Boggan 00:34:21 Demo: Mission Control in VS Code 00:37:07 Announcing the GitHub agent in Slack 00:38:19 The next generation of Copilot Code Review 00:39:42 Demo: Agentic Copilot Code Review 00:42:11 Improving the pull request experience 00:43:29 Introducing GitHub Code Quality 00:44:29 Announcing the Copilot Metrics dashboard 00:45:23 New enterprise AI controls 00:46:40 The new era of collaboration 00:47:35 Fireside chat with Satya Nadella 00:59:19 Conclusion: The home for all developers

#GitHubUniverse #GitHubUniverse2025 #GitHub
